title: SICK HUGE! Lofty Reno'd Apt ONE BLOCK From Maria Hernadez and L Train!
posting_body: ['All Pets Allowed.', 'Nearby subway stations include: Jefferson St(L), Central Av (M).Check this one out!', 'This beautiful apartment in the heart of Bushwick boasts high ceilings, hardwood floors, 3 great sized bedrooms and each one has a closet!', 'Also very close to so many restaurants and galleries.', 'Only one unit available and it will go fast!', 'The top floor unit even has an indoor balcony space to use as storage, office or whatever you want.', 'Get on this quick!!', 'MUST HAVE PROOF OF 35-40X THE RENT AND A 680 CREDIT SCORE, IF NOT THEN DONT WORRY AS GUARANTORS ARE TOTALLY COOL WITH US!', 'DEFINITELY', 'A MUST SEE FOR THIS PRICE AND LOCATION!', 'PAYING EXTRA RENT OR SECURITY IN EXCHANGE FOR NOT MEETING REQUIREMENTS CAN NO LONGER BE ACCEPTED AS OF 2019', 'EMAIL OR TEXT ONLY', 'AMENITIES', '• High Ceilings', '• Hardwood floors', '• Video Intercom', '• Stone countertops', '• Storage space', '• Stainless Steel Appliances']
